name: Fuentepark Apartamentos

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Stayed here for two weeks from 25th September and had a great time. Rooms spotlessly clean, all staff friendly and helpful. Could do with a few more kitchen utensils (potato peeler and spatula etc). Could also use some form of air con in the bedroom - maybe a ceiling fan, as it was very hot in there at night, although we did start and leave the air con on in the lounge which helped a bit. Didn't try the poolside bar so cannot comment on that. They are in a prime location for shops, bars and restaurants. Will definitely be going back.
reviews.title: Clean, basic apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013
reviews.text: Our room was fine, clean, very quiet location staff were helpful.
reviews.title: Basic but fine

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only couple of gripes, kitchen too small to actually prepare anything in also no tea towels for washing up, separate beds just pushed together but apart from that the apartment was adequate.
reviews.title: good but those sunbed towels!
A little better than average but not quite very good....
reviews.text: Had room 54 to hot to sit out and eat breakfast and no sun late afternoon. Wifi good though.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: recently returned 23 september, good place to stay few minutes walk to main drag and beach.We was annoyed at same people hogging sunbeds towels put out very early,thought that was a thing of the past.Hotel says they would remove anything like that but never did.room was ok air con was not very effective,cleaning was a bit hit and miss kitchen missed most days also towels,but we enjoyed it there and would definatly go back again.If you like sun in the morning and afternoon but shade late afternoon and evening room 44 or 43 ideal.Do not miss the music square near the harbour,great time!!!
reviews.title: Returning for the 3rd time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are returning this wednesday for a 10 day break simply because its great there.The hotel is good but what makes this place great are the staff.The possitive feedback Fuentepark gets is no more than it deserves.If you havent stayed here then trust the reviews and book up.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013
reviews.text: Ideal central location, spotless apartment, requested corner balcony with sun and got it (no 72)
reviews.title: Can not wait to go back!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: friendly very helpful staff, lovely pool, ideally would like a laundry room but they do have laundry service but only comes back the next day which is not ideal for beach towels
reviews.title: Friendly Fuentepark

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a 4 day stay the first week in June. I had emailed ahead asking for a first floor apartment and stated that we were celebrating our wedding anniversary. On arrival the receptionist was lovely and offered congratulations. Waiting in our room was a bottle of champagne.
reviews.title: Fantastic location & excellent staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: During our stay both receptionists were extremely helpful in recommending restaurants, bars and beaches for us to explore when we hired a car.
reviews.title: Good to return again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The apartments are located a stones throw from everything. Kitchen is great for self catering and it even had an oven. The bed was bigger than our king at home. The decor could do with some sprucing imo but it is very clean and that's all the mattered to me. Would highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Great location and great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: It was good to return to Fuentapark once again. A warm welcome from Pia and Alberto who were on duty. All the staff are very friendly and welcoming. Cleaning was up to the usual standard. I must comment on the good condition of the gardens and the well kept plants and trees.Praise to the gardeners. It is a pity that there are a few more empty shops in the town, but thats the sign of the times. The road works are still ongoing but it will be good once its all done. Could have a few more seats for us older ones on the new areas. We had a good holiday and look forward to returning in October.
reviews.title: Good Priced Accommodation in a good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed at the Fuentepark apartments from 29th May until 5th June and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The beds are very comfortable and the apartments are centrally located for everything that you may wish - supermarket, pubs, restaurants and tour offices. The pool is great and is of a decent enough size to actually have a swim. As has been previously mentioned, the apartments could do with having a microwave but that is just a very small point, as everything else is there. The fridge/freezers are large and with the supermarket being so close, you do not need to stock up. Would gladly return!
reviews.title: perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is faultless. It is clean, tidy, relaxing and the staff are friendly and helpful. The apartments are clean, spacious and have everything you need for a comfortable stay. There is loads of wardrobe space in the bedroom and even a hairdryer in the bathroom. The kitchen is small but again has everything you need including a large fridge/freezer. The rooms are cleaned everyday and towels are changed every 3 days. The sheets in the bedroom were changed twice a week.
reviews.title: Perfect Get Away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: Breakfast had a good selection of breads, ham, cheese, cooked food, yogurts, fruit, tea, coffee and juice. The pool area is clean, very relaxing and quiet. There was never a rush for sunbeds. However there is a major lack of sun umbrellas (only about 10 to 60 sunbeds). The trees surrounding the pool area do offer some shade though and there are even cushions to use on the sunbeds. There is also a pool bar which serves drinks and snacks.
reviews.title: Brilliant

likes.liked: — Location, Location, Location and relaxing atmosphere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: The best thing about this hotel is its location. Literally a 1 minute walk and you are on the main street but like others have said in their reviews the complex is far enough way to not hear any noise at night. It is central to the main attractions such as the beach, Baku Waterpark, the harbour, shops and restaurants. I would recommend taking the number 6 bus to the National Park where the sand dunes are! They are breath taking and defiantly worth a visit. Correlejo has loads of lovely restaurants to eat in but is generally much quieter than the other Canary Islands in terms of night life. I would recommend walking down the harbour area where there are some great restaurants and some really nice jewellery shops.
reviews.title: Very enjoyable stay

likes.liked: — No childrens entertainment, thus no kids running around screaming etc

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall the hotel was fantastic and if I was returning to Correlejo again I would defiantly book to stay here again!
reviews.title: Fantastic holiday and apartments
Great Value & Great Location
reviews.text: This hotel is lovely.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from Fuentepark our seventh stay in their apartments. The staff were very helpful with all our requests and sorted out any problems without delay. The gardens were looking very neat and tidy and we watched the tall palm trees being cut. We spent our 50 anniversary there a good place to stay on the balcony in the sunshine. Back next May.
reviews.title: Our Seventh Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Loved these apartments and would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: Lovely clean apartments, great value and welcoming staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms were basic but spotlessly clean and well maintained, the pool bar was great value and food was lovely would recommend canarian potatoes and Russian salad.
reviews.title: mouse on tour.
Book Fuentepark for a relaxed good value holiday.
reviews.text: Apartments are very central with the bars and shops just around the corner, with a supermarket 2 mins away.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff were very friendly and helpful and we felt very welcome, love the free wifi!
reviews.title: Another great stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a fantastic week stay at the Fuentepark apartments. Friendly staff at reception provided a fast and efficient check in as well as providing a map and directions to local supermarkets and other amenities. Our apartment was on the ground floor overlooking the swimming pool and had a huge terrace with patio furniture. The apartment itself was well equipped, comfortable and spotlessly clean. The kitchen has a cooker, fridge freezer, kettle, toaster and plenty of crockery and a coffee pot. We had everything we needed to cook breakfast in the morning. The living room contained a comfortable sofa bed, flat screen tv and additional dining furniture. The bedroom had a huge double bed (much preferable to two singles pushed together) which was extremely comfortable, and ample storage space in mirrored wardrobes as well as a safe which was just a small charge for the week. The bathroom had an excellent power shower and towels were replaced every other day. The maid service was also every other day. The pool area was well maintained and plenty of loungers and umbrellas available. The pool bar was reasonable and had a decent food menu. The free wi-fi was an added bonus. The location is fantastic-2 minutes walk to the strip and 5 minutes to the beach. Plenty of bars and restaurants about and a further 10 minute walk to music square.
reviews.title: Excellent stay. Would highly recommend!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We booked transfers to the hotel with travel republic and were told to ask at reception for a pick up time for our return to the airport on the way home. However the staff at the apartments were so good that we never had to-the fax was delivered to our apartment and was on the kitchen table waiting for us.
reviews.title: Another Wonderful Holiday here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will definitely be back in Corralejo, and we will definitely stay in the Fuentepark!
reviews.title: Excellent Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is our second year at fuentepark, and we had another wonderful stay, the location is the big bonus of these apartments, 5 mins to beach, supermarket 2 mins, old town about a 10-15 min walk where all the main eating places and harbour is, all the staff are wonderful, big thank you to the ladies at the poolside bar looked after us our whole holiday, pool clean and freezing cold but this didn’t stop my 7 year old and her cousins staying in pool all day and me for most of the day, enough sun loungers for everyone, the place was full but you didn`t have to worry about getting up early or a made rush for the sun loungers
reviews.title: Pleasant stay at Funetepark

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: the only thing i would say, bits and pieces in the rooms need replacing and upgrading( but it does look they are doing this as they was working on a couple of apartments)
reviews.title: If only....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013
reviews.text: The location was perfect! Restaurants, bars & super markets right on your door step - though there's lots of snack bars through out the day on the strip the snack bar around the pool is just as good!
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you want the best English breakfast & Sunday dinners go to Penny Lane! The staff are so friendly and the food is British perfection!
reviews.title: great hotel in great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pool area well maintained, no problems with towels on sun beds.
reviews.title: Ticks all the boxes

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Kitchen is small but adequate.
reviews.title: Can't wait to return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013
reviews.text: Would recommend this apartment!
reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013
reviews.text: Visited in June 2013 found the location was great apartment was clean but not as big as it looks on photos. In desperate need of a lick if paint but still enjoyed our stay. Pool area needs to be organised more by staff most loungers had towels on them from very early but not a person in sight, could not use pool much for this reason but beach is very nearby.
reviews.title: Great location , clean.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I recently returned from our trip to Fuerteventura and can honestly say that we had a fabulous holiday, just what we needed.
reviews.title: Fuentepark apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for the first time at the Fuentepark apartments and will definitely be returning. We have stayed at other complexes but this was definitely the best.
reviews.title: Just returned for the 2nd time in 12 months

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The apartments are very clean and are cleaned 5 days per week, the maids even smile!
reviews.title: fab location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The reception staff are polite and happy to help with any question / query you may have and speak excellent English, reception is open from 7am to 11pm but during the night there is a security guard who patrols the grounds and is available should there be any problems.
reviews.title: Great apartment complex

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The apartments have a good location, a short walk to the beach - closer than most we saw and close to shops and restaurants. My only problem was the fact the pool was freezing when it was stated that it would be heated in winter - travelling with a 13 month old I wanted to enjoy playing in a relatively warmish pool - unfortunately we couldn't do this as it was too cold for my little one. Reception staff said they would speak to maintenance but nothing changed. Apartment size was fine, kitchen small and sparse, and a little dangerous to let the little one out on to the patio as very sharp cut down trees straight outside, but rest was fine - lovely size bed and bathroom ok. Reception staff friendly and helpful. Probably would go back but in the summer months when the pool could heat itself!
reviews.title: Decent apartments, disappointed pool not heated as stated!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Seriously wouldn't recommend this place. Ok we didn’t pay a fortune though I would have paid more if there was something better available. Supposedly a 4* apartment – if so, it was in serious need of refurbishment. Though the apartment was clean, the bathroom was hideous, pillows indescribable and towels were ancient/grey/rough.
reviews.title: Don't even think about it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Though the Pool Bar staff were nice and prices reasonable but the sunbeds (I think were originally the standard white plastic ones) were somehow filthy looking. As if that wasn’t bad enough, the cushions which were to be put on the sunbeds were so soiled by I can only think were the remnants of other people’s suntan lotion & sweat!
reviews.title: Excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location was good. Corralejo was a much busier resort than I expected it to be - LOADS of good shops. Bit of a surfers paradise really. Lots of bars and restaurants. Best restaurant by far was El Andaluz – you must book though as it’s a very small place but well worth it for her standard of cuisine.
reviews.title: Calm, Friendly and so relaxing (not to mention good value for money)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Just returned from the Fuenta Park apartments, spotlessly clean, spacious apartment overlooking the pool, good maid service and friendly staff. Excellent check in, ticket for complimentary drinks at the pool bar and 10% off offers at certain restaurants and bars as guests of Fuente Park. We had a couple of breakfasts and the odd lunch at the pool bar, the food was very nice and very good value for money at about 3.50 euros would reccomend. The location is excellent with shops and bars and restaurants literally a couple of minutes walk from the apartments and just another few minutes to the beach. The apartments are very peaceful and relaxing and we weren't disturbed by any noise even though we were only a few minutes from the main strip. We had a nice meal in the Waikiki restaurant down at the beach looking out over the moonlit sea, very reasonalble prices with meals from 8.50 euros. Drinks in most bars were 2 euros for local beer and 3 euros for Carling, you could get local spirits with mixers for about 3 euros in most bars although 2 bacardi and cokes were 11 euros in the Rock Cafe but they had a fantastic group playing there. If you like good old british holiday entertainment go to the Talk of the Town and Golden Days 60's & 70's bar with karioke, quiz nights and elvis impersonator! and english tv channels, we were able to watch X Factor there - Joe to win! We really enjoyed our holiday in Corralejo, the weather was great at this time of year 24 -27 degrees and would go back to Fuente Park apartments. This was not 5 star but a good value holiday, we booked with Travel Republic.
reviews.title: Still a great place for a stress free holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Never sure what to expect after booking online we were pleasantly surprised on arrival. If you're looking for a comfortable, clean and friendly place to stay, this is the one. Set just off the main road its surprisingly quiet. The pool bar is exceptionally reasonable with 1/2 chicken & chips at 3.50 euros. A 2 min walk takes you to the shopping area with plenty of restaurants and an rather scrummy curry house 5 mins away that also delivers. The beach is a 5 min walk away passing Penny Lane a delightful british run cafe. They serve a Sunday roast with Bisto Gravy and proper English tea. All in all a great week and will definately go back but book direct rather than thro Agent this time.
reviews.title: Great location but quiet, clean, friendly staff & lovely pool area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Went to fuente park in april 2009 with my girlfriend and thought it was excellant accomodation for the price we paid which was 210 for the week,only 2 mins walk to all the shops,bars and resteraunts and a 5 min walk(max)to the beach.Even being so close to the centre it was very quiet at nite.The pool bar was good value for drinks and food.The pool was a bit cold but it cooled you down nicely when it was hot.i would highly reccomend these apartments.The only thing that put us off about corralejo was the people trying to get you into the resteraunts pestering you a bit but you can avoid them if you try.waiki bar does some great food and it is on the beach with some great views.
reviews.title: excellant value and great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: PLACE TO STAY...stay at the Fuerte Park Apartments, lovely pool, very clean, nice staff, good food ( no late entertainment mind but we were just out of season). Would say not really a kiddie apartment, they do have kiddie pool but nothing for them to do it is not a KIDS CLUB hotel etc... but great for adults who want to chill out. The apartments themselves needed updating a little and they are in the process of this...kitchens have been done but the bathrooms need a little lick of paint...again DON'T let it put you off as they are very tidy and clean and for the price are great and central to everything in the town.
reviews.title: lovely little hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: FOOD......Plenty of restaurants, mainly steak houses...... try the Casa De La Carne STEAK HOUSE....www.casadelacarne.es
reviews.title: The good the bad and the ugly!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: This is one of the worst apartments i have stayed at it is not clean the apartments are really rundown lots of broken things and bugs living in the settee aircon was clogged with debris and the shower went very hot and cold -so was not ideal there was a terrible smell in these aparments i do not mind basic but clean fresh and basic is what we would want. Tv was all in German not that we wanted to watch tv but these are not 4 star- if anything 1 star the only good thing i can say is the pool was nice and the cold did not bother me but alot of people thought it was heated and it was not a heated pool . I would not recommend these apartments to anyone and was not looking for the Ritz just a clean place with furniture that is not all tired and worn. It is a great shame as if these apartments had total makeover it is a perfect location .
reviews.title: Not what you think

likes.liked: — the clean pool just getting out the apartment as quick as possible was good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my partner stayed there for 2 weeks and did not have 1 complaint about the place,the staff were friendly and maid service was every day,weather for location was brilliant but on some days when it is windy you sometimes get goosebumps later in afternoon but overall execellent place to stay.
reviews.title: Tidy quiet place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: We had a fantastic holiday , would definatley go back again, the hotel staff were very helpful and our apartment looked over the pool. It is very secure as the are guards walking round the grounds at night and it is about a 2 minute walk from the main strip were all of your restraunts and bars are, also on the main strip there is supermarkets as you can cook your own meals in your apartment and there other little shops which are very nice. All the people are very helpful and would highly reccomend.
reviews.title: Great Holiday *****

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: Booked online and paid a reasonable price for two adults and a child. Setting of this small hotel is lovely, up a side street off of the main strip. Access to beach, town. bars all very easy even with a push chair.
reviews.title: Great location

likes.liked: — Its layout all around the pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room (apartment) was very spacious with sun terrace and furniture over looking the pool. Bathroom could have done with a refit but nothing drastic.
reviews.title: Great Hotel - No probs

description: Fuentepark Apartamentos is located in the heart of the tourist resort Corralejo, a unique part of Fuerteventura, just a few steps from some of the best restaurants, shopping centres, leisure centres, banks, etc, just 200 metres from beautiful Corralejo Beach and 3 km from The Dunes, area of outstanding natural beauty. Not far from the complex you can catch the boats that go daily to Lanzarote and Lobos Island.Within the complex, you will find the ultimate relaxing family environment where you can enjoy facilities such as a large adult pool and another one for children, both heated during winter (21st Dec-21st March) and surrounded by marvellous gardens.
